data.title: Tyriq Harris - Football
data.meta_description: Tyriq Harris (10) Defensive End  - At Charlotte: Four-year starter ... school's first three-time team captain (2020, 2019, 2018) ... 2020 William V. Campbell Award

10 Tyriq Harris

Hometown Roanoke, VA

Highschool Hidden Valley

Bio

Related

Stats

Historical

Biography

At Charlotte: Four-year starter ... school's first three-time team captain (2020, 2019, 2018) ... 2020 William V. Campbell Award Finalist (one of 12) ... 2020 NFF National Scholar-Athlete Class ... 2020 Wuerffel Trophy Semifinalist (one of nine) ... One of three players in the country selected as both a 2020 Campbell finalist and a 2020 Wuerffel semifinalist ... 2020 Senior CLASS Top 30 ... 2019 Wuerffel Trophy Watch List (Community Servant) ... 2019 William V. Campbell Award Semifinalist ... Missed entire 2019 season with injury ... nominee for 2019 Allstate AFCA Good Works Team ... 2018-19 C-USA Football Scholar-Athlete of the Year ... 2018 Honorable Mention all-Conference USA ... named 2018 third-team all-C-USA by Phil Steele ... 2016 Conference USA all-Freshman team ... 2018 Google Cloud Academic all-District 3 ... 2020, 2018, 2017 C-USA all-Academic team ... moved from LB to DE in 2018 ... completed his career ranked seventh in school history with 168 career tackles, fifth in career tackles for loss (15.0) and fourth in career sacks (7.0) ... started the last 38 straight games in which he played in his 41-game career ... three-time Chancellor’s List (3.8 GPA or higher) honoree ... named 49ers’ SAAC “Mr. 49er” recognizing involvement in 2017-18, 2018-19 and 2019-20 ... signed with the 49ers on Feb. 4, 2015 as part of the program’s fourth signee class ... 2020 C-USA Fall Spirit of Service Award.

2020: Team co-captain ... Honorable mention all-Conference USA (coaches) ... Started in all six games … Recorded a tackle and 1.0 TFL against App State … Added three tackles and was one of five players with a QB hurry versus FAU … Tallied four tackles against North Texas … Recorded five tackles, 1.0 TFL and 1.0 sack against UTEP … Had a fourth-down sack in the same game that led to a fourth-quarter touchdown … Was selected to wear the 49ers honorary #49 jersey against WKU … Recorded four tackles and a forced fumble versus WKU ... Received Fourth-Team All-Conference USA honors (Phil Steele) .... 2020 William V. Campbell Award Finalist (one of 12) ... 2020 NFF National Scholar-Athlete Class ... 2020 Wuerffel Trophy Semifinalist (one of nine) ... One of three players in the country selected as both a 2020 Campbell finalist and a 2020 Wuerffel semifinalist ... 2020 C-USA All-Academic Team, joining Memphis quarterback Brady White and Texas quarterback Sam Ehlinger ... Harris and White are the only two that are also among the Senior CLASS Top 30 Candidates.

2019: Wuerffel Trophy Watch List (Community Servant) ... nominee for Allstate AFCA Good Works Team … missed entire season with injury … team co-captain.

2018: 2018-19 C-USA Football Scholar-Athlete of the Year ... 2018 Honorable Mention all-Conference USA ... named 2018 third-team all-C-USA by Phil Steele ... 2018 team captain 2018 Google Cloud Academic all-District 3 ... 2018 C-USA all-Academic team ... started all 12 games at DE ... career-highs in tackles (56; 4.7/gm), TFL (5.5) and sacks (2.5) ... fifth on team in tackles, third in TFL and fourth in sacks ... added a PBU and a QBh ... had a FR at UMass ... high of 7.0 tackles vs. Marshall and FAU ... averaged 6.4 tackles over last 5 games … team co-captain.

2017: Started all 12 games at OLB ... totaled 47 tackles (24 solo) with 4.5 TFL, 1.5 sacks, two QBh and one FF ... had high of 7.0 tackles at FIU ... five games with 5+ tackles ... six tackles vs. Marshall and Florida Atlantic ... five tackles at Eastern Michigan and vs. UAB ... 1.0 TFL at #19 Kansas State, vs. Georgia State, vs. Middle Tennessee and vs. Florida Atlantic ... had 1.0 sack vs. MT and 0.5 sack at ODU.

2016: Conference USA all-Freshman team ... Played in 11 games with eight starts as a red-shirt freshman ... made first career start at Temple (game four) and started next seven games ... DNP (inj.) in season-finale at UTSA ... sixth on the team with 46 tackles (24 solo) ... five or more tackles in six games ... high of six tackles vs. Eastern Michigan, vs. Rice and vs. Middle Tennessee ... five tackles at Florida Atlantic, vs. FIU and at Marshall ... had 3.0 TFL with 2.0 sacks (vs. Eastern Michigan and at Marshall) ... third on team with six QBh ... tied a single-game school-record with four QBh vs. Rice ... had two QBh and one PBU vs. FIU (5 tackles; 1.0 TFL) ... finished season with two PBUs.

2015: Red-shirt season.

Academics: Graduated cum laude with a degree in biology ... 2018-19 C-USA Football Scholar-Athlete of the Year ... 2018 Google Cloud Academic all-District 3 ... 2020, 2018, 2017 C-USA all-Academic team ... Named to Chancellor’s List (3.8 GPA or higher): Fall 2015 (Perfect 4.0 GPA), Spring 2016, Spring 2017 (Perfect 4.0 GPA), Fall 2018 ... Dean’s List (3.4-3.79): Spring 2019, Fall 2017 and Spring 2018 ... Athletic Director’s List (3.0 GPA or higher) Fall 2016, Fall 2019, spring 2020 ... 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019 and 2020 C-USA Honor Roll. 2020 Commissioner's honor Roll

at Hidden Valley H.S.: Second-team all-state selection (all-purpose defense) as a senior with 87 tackles, 15.5 TFL and 5.0 sacks ... two-time first-team all-conference defensive lineman ... first-team all-Region as a senior (all-purpose defense) ... 2014 team captain ... two-star recruit by Rivals.com ... A three-year letterwinner for the Titans ... led Hidden Valley to an 8-3 record and a Virginia 3A Tournament appearance ... senior season included a seven-game win streak under head coach Scott Weaver ... had 70 tackles, 11.0 sacks and one interception as a junior.

Personal: Born July 3, 1997 ... parents are Keith and Cari Harris ... has a sister, Lyric ... President of the Beta Club and member of English Honor Society ... received undergrad degree in biology in 2019 and graduated cum laude ... pursuing second degree in business ... father was in the military and Tyriq has lived in Germany, Virginia and New Jersey.
